descriptionHtml:
Changes the chances of pickpocket to emulate rolling a 20-sided die.

It still has 'in-between' values (eg 42%) rather than being multiples of 5, but this way you have a change of 'rolling 1' and failing regardless of your skill (95%) or 'rolling 20' and succeeding even if you're normally useless (min 5%).
This also means that in extreme scenarios (such as a person carrying thousands in gold) where failure ought to be guaranteed, you may be tempted to try your luck....

Really quick edit to two Game Settings fields. Should be compatible with anything that doesn't modify iPickpocketMaxChance or iPickpocketMinChance.
author: snackrat
